Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for continuing to keep Nursery_C as your first choice. We appreciate your flexibility and your readiness to move quickly.

- Any required deposit/payment method ready (we would only request this after an offer is made)

If we do reach out, we typically ask families to confirm acceptance within a short timeframe, so staying reachable by phone/email (as you’ve been) is the key step.

On timing: late offers can occur at various points depending on changes in other families’ plans, so we can’t predict a specific week, but they tend to happen when other placements are finalized and occasional vacancies appear. If we are able to move forward, we will contact families in line with our admissions priorities and current availability.

Thank you again for your patience, and please do keep us updated if anything changes on your side.
